Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+22 vs AC; 4d6+7 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+22 vs AC; 2d6+7 damage.

At-Will

Standard

Yllosavax makes a claw attack against each enemy within reach. She also attacks one creature with a bite

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Cold

Standard

Close blast 5

+18 vs Reflex; 2d8+7 cold damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and Yllosavax uses it

At-Will ✦ Charm

Standard

Close burst 3

Targets enemies; +20 vs Will; the target makes a basic attack with a +2 bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll against a creature of Yllosavax's choice.

At-Will ✦ Radiant

Immediate Reaction

Close blast 3

Trigger: When yllosavax is hit by a melee attack while bloodied, at-will

+18 vs Reflex; 1d6+5 radiant damage.

Encounter ✦ Teleportation, Zone

Move

Close burst 3

The burst creates a zone of heavily obscured squares that lasts until the end of the encounter. Effect: Yllosavax teleports 20 squares and does not need line of sight to her destination.
Yllosavax can make opportunity attacks against all enemies within her reach (2 squares).

Encounter ✦ Polymorph

Minor

Yllosavax alters her physical form to take on the appearance of a young, white-haired female eladrin.
